subject: Proximus Selects Nextensa for New Headquarters
overview: Proximus has chosen Nextensa to develop its new headquarters in Brussels, relocating from its current towers at the Brussels North Station to the Tour & Taxis site. This move comes after a previous sale-leaseback deal fell through. Proximus aims to reduce its office space due to increased remote work and will use the proceeds from the sale to fund its fiber rollout. The companies are aiming for a final agreement in Q2 2025, with the move expected in the first half of 2027 and new offices ready by the first half of 2029. Proximus staff are currently in temporary accommodation.

subject: Proximus Refinances Revolving Credit Facility
overview: Proximus has successfully extended the maturity of its EUR 700 million Revolving Credit Facility with a group of Belgian and international banks. The renewed facility has a 5-year term with two 1-year extension options and will serve as a liquidity reserve. The credit margin is linked to the achievement of ESG targets, which will be agreed by the end of 2025.

subject: Proximus and Sagemcom Test Cargo Sailboat in Supply Chain
overview: Proximus and Sagemcom are testing the use of a cargo sailboat in their supply chain, demonstrating a commitment to sustainable practices.

subject: Proximus Global Created
overview: Proximus Group continues its journey to become a global digital communications leader by creating Proximus Global, which will oversee its international activities. This includes the transfer of BICS shares to Proximus Opal, which will be renamed Proximus Global by the end of 2024. Proximus Global encompasses the entire value chain of digital communications, with a global presence and significant revenue.

subject: Scarlet Offers More Data
overview: Scarlet, a brand of Proximus, is offering increased data volumes on its mobile plans at no extra cost, starting in 2025.

subject: Microsoft and Proximus Strategic Partnership
overview: Microsoft and Proximus have announced a 5-year strategic partnership to enhance cloud and AI solutions. This collaboration will allow both companies to leverage their expertise and product leadership, with Microsoft strengthening its use of Proximus' CPaaS & DI product suites.

subject: Proximus Fiber Network Recognition
overview: Proximus' fiber network has received recognition from nPerf and Ookla for its speed and performance, outperforming the competition.
